body_html:
Then i tried to install from https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/tree/master/tensorflow/contrib/makefile followed the steps given for raspberry pi, it got installed i got library file and the benchmark but when i ran the executable file it gave error as:
2018-05-01 21:22:46.664393: I tensorflow/tools/benchmark/benchmark_model.cc:308] Running benchmark for max 1 iterations, max -1 seconds without detailed stat logging, with -1s sleep between inferences
Illegal instruction

body:
Then i tried to install from https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/tree/master/tensorflow/contrib/makefile followed the steps given for raspberry pi, it got installed i got library file and the benchmark but when i ran the executable file it gave error as:
2018-05-01 21:22:46.664393: I tensorflow/tools/benchmark/benchmark_model.cc:308] Running benchmark for max 1 iterations, max -1 seconds without detailed stat logging, with -1s sleep between inferences
Illegal instruction
